column1: 39910367$Magical Citadel of Endymion$Unlimited$SPELL$$$$$$$$$Field$$$Each time a Spell Card is activated
column2: place 1 Spell Counter on this card when that Spell resolves. If a card with a Spell Counter(s) is destroyed

column4: if you would activate a card effect by removing a Spell Counter(s) from a card you control

column6: you can remove 1 Spell Counter from this card instead.$$$$Continuous-like$

column1: 75014062$Spell Power Grasp$Unlimited$SPELL$$$$$$$$$$$$Target 1 face-up card on the field that you can place a Spell Counter on; place 1 Spell Counter on that target
